thread.title: Fred & Pedro - Make the Day!
thread.title_full: Fred & Pedro - Make the Day! - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: TemptationTours
title: Fred & Pedro - Make the Day!
text: Fred is the weekday Restaurant Manager and Pedro is the Chef. We stayed here for two weeks. Pedro makes something different, creative, fresh and delicious, every day. His biscuits for Biscuits and Gravy Day are the Best! Not kidding, they are Great. Fred is jovial, total customer service / satisfaction guy. His "what can I do for you, if you don't see it I'll try to get it" attitude is for real. If you're in to sports, especially football, Fred's the man! Breakfast with Fred & Pedro helps set you on the right course for your day!
